name: Compilation of 2D game Prototypes
description:
This is just a compilation of my 2 attempts to make a 2D game i just compiled them into a single project since they are basically the same, to minimize clutter and make it more easier to access and to add to my growing portfolio, hope i can do an actual 2D game someday.

how to play:
very simple mechanics you can move left to right using A,D respectively, you can jump by pressing spacebar, and you can attack/shoot using left mouse click, that's about it.

P.S> again this is just a prototype it's not a fully released or completed game it only has simple functions it's my attempts to learn and try my hands on unreal engine's 2D flipbook, it's actually awesome, i just uploaded it to add to my portfolio.

music used:
Music by aldermansweden from Pixabay
Music by Asepirawan20 from Pixabay
